original_title: Musume no tomodachi to kodomo o tsukuru node mama yamemasu
overview: I try to be my ideal mother. but this is not possible. because i was in heat with my daughter's classmate "atsushi-kun"... adolescent boy who just woke up. by the time he was invited to his house, seduced and brushed off, he was completely unreasonable. found out to be a pervert, wanting to be sown with violence by this sexually active boy, feeling too twisted to abandon my "mom" position...i'm preoccupied with being a child that's too abnormal.
title: I'm Making Babies With My Daughters Friend, so I'll Stop Being a Mom
